ygData.subject: Re: FireStrike's Rage
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron sounded like he couldnt be bothered. Yes, yes, train. I expect both of you to show up, and you Firestrike to show your knew found fire. But Megatron

Megatron sounded like he couldnt be bothered. "Yes, yes, train. I expect
both of you to show up, and you Firestrike to show your knew found
fire." But Megatron was more curious if they would look into what had
seemed to have gotten Firestrike's attention.
